Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Request Input A description of a loan application process with two types of constraints Part 1 Normative Process Behavior Strict Rules Part 2 Desiderata Recommended but Not Strict Event Log A table containing 3 cases with timestamps and activities Task 1 Identify normative rule violations per case and explain reasons 2 Identify desiderata failures per case and clarify severity 3 Suggest interpretations justifications for observed behaviors where possible

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Normative Rules Strict Start Application Received Sequence App Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Docs Close Case Ordering Credit Check must occur before Risk Assessment Risk Assessment before Loan Decision Loan Decision before Inform Applicant If approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case If rejected do not finalize documentation before closing Prohibitions Skipping activities Changing order Performing Finalize Documentation after rejection Closing case without following decision logic

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Desiderata Recommended Credit Check within 24h of Application Received Inform Applicant within 48h of Loan Decision Followup Call sometime before Close Case encouraged but not strictly required Failing to adhere to these timing recommendations or skipping followup call is not serious violation These are desiderata rather than hard rules

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Event Log Case by Case Case 1 Sequence App Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Docs Close Case Timing App to Credit Check 30 mins Decision to Inform 2 hours OK Followup Call Not present Normative Check All steps present correct order Approved path followed correctly Verdict Compliant with strict rules Minor desideratum miss No Followup Case 2 Sequence App Received Risk Assessment Credit Check Loan Decision Rejected Finalize Docs Close Case Normative Check Risk Assessment before Credit Check Violation Loan Decision Rejected Finalize Documentation after Rejection Violation Inform Applicant step missing entirely Violation Desiderata App to Credit 1 hour OK Case 3 Sequence App Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Docs Close Case Normative Check All steps present correct order Approved path followed correctly Desiderata App Jan12 0900 to Credit Check Jan14 1000 2 days 1 hour over 24h Violation Decision Jan14 1200 to Inform Jan16 1500 2 days 3 hours over 48h Violation Followup Call Missing Verdict Compliant with strict rules Multiple desiderata failures

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Draft the Response Structure 1 Normative Violations Analysis Case 1 2 3 2 Desiderata Failures Analysis Case 1 2 3 3 Interpretations Justifications Drafting Content Case 1 No normative violations Missing Followup Call desideratum Case 2 Major normative violations Order swapped Risk before Credit Finalized docs on Rejection Missing Inform Applicant Case 3 No normative violations Timing delays on Credit Check and Informing Missing Followup Refining Explanations Ensure clear distinction between Strict Rules Violations and Desiderata Suboptimal

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Calendar Check for Case 3 Jan 12 2024 Friday Jan 14 2024 Sunday Jan 16 2024 Tuesday This provides strong justification for timing delays weekend nonworking days Justification for Case 3 weekend effect operationally reasonable despite technically late Calendar Check for Case 2 Jan 11 2024 Thursday Working day No obvious calendar excuse for order swap

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Justification for Case 2 Why swap Credit Risk Maybe preliminary risk score used before hard credit check Why docs on rejection Maybe standard template generation automatically before human review caught rejection Why no inform Maybe system crash or assumed rejection letter autosent but not logged Offer plausible operational hypotheses human error system glitch urgent processing overriding rules Staff shortage for Case 3 delays

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final Review against Constraints Did I identify normative violations Yes Case 2 Did I identify desiderata failures Yes Case 1 2 3 Did I clarify severity Yes Strict vs Recommended Did I suggest interpretations Yes Final Review SelfCorrection on Case 2 Inform Applicant no event recorded normative violation skipping activities SelfCorrection on Case 1 Followup desideratum not normative Align with log notes No prior Credit Check violates Risk before Credit Not allowed after rejection Happened more than 24 hours Later than recommended 48 hours
